name: defi-rubyswap-v3
description: Uniswap V3-style DEX with concentrated liquidity and advanced AMM features

scripts.coverage:check: hardhat coverage && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const c=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('coverage/coverage-summary.json','utf8'));const s=c.total.statements.pct;const b=c.total.branches.pct;const f=c.total.functions.pct;const l=c.total.lines.pct;const pass=[s,b,f,l].every(x=>x>=90);if(!pass){console.error('Coverage below 90%:',{s,b,f,l});process.exit(1);}else{console.log('Coverage OK:',{s,b,f,l});}"

author: Yiannis Chen
